Italian: Tu ti distingui per le tue capacità atletiche

English: You are aware of your surroundings
Italian: Sei molto attento a tutto quello che accade intorno a te

English: You are the first to react in a situation
You keep calm whilst under heavy pressure
Italian: Sai mantenere la calma nelle situazioni di stress

English: You are the one people look toward for decisions
You talk and others listen to every word
